description: As part of the EXTRA BASS range from Sony, the WH-XB700 headphones enhance all your low-end frequencies for exceptional bass, yet retaining vocal clarity, lifting every track with wave after wave of thundering rhythm.
No matter where you are, in the bus, at office or just walking around, with this pair of Sony wireless headphones, you can experience immersive audio clarity.

productName: Sony WH-XB900N Noise Cancelling Bluetooth Headset
description: Whether you are looking for some upbeat tunes to be productive at your workplace or motivational lyrics while working out at the gym, this powerful Sony WH-XB900N Bluetooth Headset with mic will meet all your musical needs. This audio device features Sonyâ€™s Extra Bass technology, a Noise Cancelling technology, and a smart Voice Assistant to offer you uninterrupted, foot-tapping music.

Dive deeper into your favorite music and silence the noise of the world with the Sony WH-1000XM3 Bluetooth Headset that features a number of innovative technologies. This personal audio device comes with HD Noise Cancelling Processor QN1, Powerful 40-mm Drivers, and up to 30 Hours of Battery Life for an intense and immersive musical experience.
